      • getSubmenu

      • getLayoutWeight

        public float getLayoutWeight()
        Gets the layout weight for the button. Buttons are scaled along their arc dimension in accordance with their weights.
        Returns:
        the dimensionless weight for the button

      • setLayoutWeight

        public void setLayoutWeight(float weight)
        Set the layout weight for the button to determine is span dimension upon layout. Weights are positive dimensionless values that modify relative layout size in their parent radial menu.
        Parameters:
        weight - to be associated with the button instance.
